abstract: CNN is telecasting “CNN Heroes: An All-Star Tribute,” an unusual awards show, at 9 p.m. Thursday. The two-hour event, hosted by the anchor Anderson Cooper, recognizes people it calls unheralded heroes — “people driven to exceptional achievement in service to others.”

lead_paragraph: On Thanksgiving, CNN honors its hand-picked heroes.

headline.main: An Unusual Thanksgiving Day Awards Show on CNN
